exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
The reference x was not found in the current environment.
In environment X : Type A : list X p : X -> Prop H1 : forall x : X, dec (p x) x : X H : x el A Unable to unify "{p ?M1503} + {~ p ?M1503}" with "p x".

original: intros H1. remember (H1) as H2. destruct H2. left. exists x. split. - intros. subst. auto. - intros. apply H1. intro H2. apply H0. auto. - right. intros H2 H3. apply H0. intro H4. apply H3. auto.
